buginformation.summary: language ecmascript strict results use strict per input file
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem create file called quot get num quot with the contents quot var get num function return quot create file called quot alert quot with the contents quot alert get num quot compile the two files with the following command java jar compiler jar language ecmascript strict compilation level advanced optimizations warning level verbose get num alert what the expected output what you see instead would expect the output use strict alert the compiler wants really clever just quot alert quot since this already strict compliant what version the product are you using what operating system head mac please provide any additional information below https groups google com forum topic closure compiler discuss tol xpe pju taking look right now its fixed should the next release this issue was closed revision 1192
